scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build-js && npm run build-copy
scripts.build-js: browserify screen-1.js -o dist/screen-1.js && browserify screen-2.js -o dist/screen-2.js && browserify screen-3.js -o dist/screen-3.js
scripts.build-copy: cp screen-1.html dist/screen-1.html && cp screen-2.html dist/screen-2.html && cp screen-3.html dist/screen-3.html && cp -R assets dist/assets
